With effect from 1st April 2003, the licensing and enforcement of nurses' agencies passes from the local authority to the new National Care Standards Commission (NCSC).

For more information please visit the National Care Standards Commission Web site link to external website

Existing nurses' agencies will have their registrations transferred to the NCSC.

New providers of these services will be required to register with the NCSC before they can commence their operations.
